Commands.HP Regen: Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV × 1.0  Party: 6 turns HP Regen (marginally restores HP each turn)
Commands.Smite: Holy magic BRV attack  Grants party stolen BRV

Passives.HP Regen Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using HP Regen.
Passives.Smite Charge: Increases the max uses of Smite by 1.
Passives.HP Regen BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using HP Regen.
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after taking HP damage.
Passives.HP Regen Charge: Increases the max uses of HP Regen by 1.
Passives.Smite Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Smite.
Passives.Blessing of Madain Sari: Grants +1 turn to pre-existing buffs when buffing allies.
Passives.Buffed Initial Boost: Moderately raises INT BRV, MAX BRV with active buffs
Passives.HP Regen Extension: When using HP Regen:   Tremendous boost to BRV granted based on INT BRV   Party: 12 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up, ATK UpAfter using HP Regen:   Triggers additional HP attack   HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (slightly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP) for 12 turns
Passives.All Buffed Attack Boost: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Smite Extension: Smite use count +2When using Smite:   Moderate damage boost   Triggers additional HP attack after useAfter using Smite:   BRV Attack becomes powerful BRV Attack+ (Holy magic BRV attack; grants party BRV based on own ATK) for 5 turns

Weapons.Magic Racket CP: 35: Increases Smite's potency and lowers its Action Delay.Raises all party members' BRV based on Eiko's Attack.Grants Medium Speed Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Priest Racket CP: 15: Extends the duration of HP Regen to 12 turns.Grants Small Attack Up and Small Max BRV Up for 12 turns.
